product_name: Picnic At Ascot Cheshire Picnic Basket for 2 with Blanket
long_description: Beautifully handcrafted from natural reed willow, the sophisticated Cheshire Picnic Basket for 2 with Blanket from Picnic At Ascot includes ceramic plates and actual glass wine glasses.
